subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: When Nevada-Las Vegas won the 1990 championship, Stacey Augmon was a star and Dave Rice a little-used reserve. Now Rice is the coach and Augmon an assistant.
snippet: When Nevada-Las Vegas won the 1990 championship, Stacey Augmon was a star and Dave Rice a little-used reserve. Now Rice is the coach and Augmon an assistant.
